author: danif984
name: Dani Fyre
title: How to solve the value of X?
content: I'm having trouble with the problem 2x+10=5. My teacher didn't really explain this properly.

author: jclam232
name: Joshua Clam
title: ピタゴラスの定理のことを分かりません。
content: 英語は良く分からないので、先生の授業を聞きませんでした。ピタゴラスの定理はなんですか？

author: hbread123
name: Hyunjin Bread
title: x^2+10 의 미분을 어떻게 풀어요?
content: 미분법을 잘 모르겠어요. 이것을 어떻게 풀어요?
